hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf ./* export WS=`pwd` sudo zypper refresh sudo zypper update -y #Install dependencies from repo sudo zypper install -y git java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel ant liberation-fonts net-tools
#Set JAVA_HOME export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
#Install openjfx dependencies sudo zypper install -y mercurial bison flex gperf ksh pkgconfig \ libpng12-devel libjpeg-devel libxml2-devel libxslt-devel systemd-devel glib2-devel gtk2-devel \ libXtst-devel pango-devel freetype-devel wget unzip ant gcc gcc-c++
#Install gradle wget https://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-1.8-bin.zip unzip gradle-1.8-bin.zip export PATH=$PATH:$PWD/gradle-1.8/bin
#Get openjfx source hg clone http://hg.openjdk.java.net/openjfx/8u60/rt cp $WS/rt/build.gradle $WS/rt/build.gradle.orig
#Add s390x support sed -i '707d' $WS/rt/build.gradle sed -i '706a} else if (IS_LINUX && OS_ARCH != "i386" && OS_ARCH != "amd64" && OS_ARCH != "s390x") {' $WS/rt/build.gradle sed -i '250d' $WS/rt/build.gradle sed -i '249aext.IS_64 = OS_ARCH.toLowerCase().contains("64") || OS_ARCH.contains("s390x")' $WS/rt/build.gradle diff -u $WS/rt/build.gradle.orig $WS/rt/build.gradle || true
#Add fix: http://hg.openjdk.java.net/openjfx/9-dev/rt/rev/d5312b49f9ad for build failure with latest OpenJDK cd $WS/rt sed -i "81aimport sun.java2d.SurfaceData;" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "690d" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "689a\ newScaleFactor = getDefaultScale(((SunGraphics2D)g).surfaceData);" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "649a\ private int getDefaultScale(SurfaceData surfaceData) {" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "650a\ double scale = 1;" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "651a\ try {" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i '652a\ Method meth = SurfaceData.class.getMethod("getDefaultScaleX");' modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "653a\ scale = (Double)meth.invoke(surfaceData);" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "654a\ } catch (Exception ex) {" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "655a\ }" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "656a\ return (int)Math.round(scale);" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java sed -i "657a\ }" modules/swing/src/main/java/javafx/embed/swing/JFXPanel.java hg diff
#Increase grammar conversion timeout for antlr cp $WS/rt/buildSrc/build.gradle $WS/rt/buildSrc/build.gradle.orig sed -i '117d' $WS/rt/buildSrc/build.gradle sed -i '116a\\targs = ["-Xconversiontimeout", 30000, "-o", dest, grammars.files].flatten()' $WS/rt/buildSrc/build.gradle diff -u $WS/rt/buildSrc/build.gradle.orig $WS/rt/buildSrc/build.gradle || true
#Build and test openjfx sudo rm -rf /usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk/jre/lib/ext/jfxrt.jar cd $WS/rt gradle #gradle test
#Copy jfxrt.jar sudo cp $WS/rt/build/sdk/rt/lib/ext/jfxrt.jar /usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk/jre/lib/ext/
#Get Jmeter source and build git clone git://git.apache.org/jmeter.git cd jmeter/ git checkout v4_0 ant download_jars ant
#Skip expected failures cp build.xml build.xml.orig sed -i -e 's/property name="skip.batchtest_SlowCharsFeature" value="false"/property name="skip.batchtest_SlowCharsFeature" value="true"/g' build.xml sed -i -e 's/property name="skip.batchtest_TestKeepAlive" value="false"/property name="skip.batchtest_TestKeepAlive" value="true"/g' build.xml diff -u build.xml.orig build.xml || true
#Increase timeout cp bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx.orig sed -i '173d' bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx sed -i '172along maxDurationPlusMargin = vars["MaxDuration"].toInteger()*100000+500;' bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx diff -u bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx.orig bin/testfiles/TestSchedulerWithTimer.jmx || true
#Run tests ant test -Djava.awt.headless=true
#Comment out G1GC algorithm as it is unimplemented in OpenJDK zero cp bin/jmeter bin/jmeter.orig sed -i '178d' bin/jmeter sed -i '177a# : "${GC_ALGO:="-XX:+UseG1GC -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=100 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20"}" ' bin/jmeter diff -u bin/jmeter.orig bin/jmeter || true
#Verify export PATH=$PATH:`pwd`/bin/ jmeter --version
